com.tomscz.afrest.marshal

Class XMLParseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afrest.marshal.XMLParseUtils

  • public class XMLParseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all string value of XML tags which are allowed in AFRest and not inside enum SupportedLayoutsProperties, SupportedProperties class, which holds supported variables.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getTextContent

        public static java.lang.String getTextContent(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        This method return text value of node. Null if node is null.
        Parameters:
        node - which value will be returned
        Returns:
        String value of node given in parameter. Null if node is null

      • setLayoutProperties

        public static void setLayoutProperties(AFFieldInfo fieldInfo,
                       java.lang.String propertyName,
                       java.lang.String propertyValue)
        This method set layout property to fieldInfo. It set only one property. All parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        fieldInfo - to which will be property set
        propertyName - name of property which will be localized in SupportedLayoutsProperties
        propertyValue - value of property which will be set to concrete property

      • setValidationsProperties

        public static void setValidationsProperties(AFFieldInfo fieldInfo,
                            java.lang.String propertyName,
                            java.lang.String propertyValue)
        This method set validation property to fieldInfo. It set only one property. All parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        fieldInfo - to which will be property set
        propertyName - name of property which will be localized in
        propertyValue - value of property which will be set to concrete property

      • setRootProperties

        public static void setRootProperties(AFFieldInfo fieldInfo,
                     java.lang.String propertyName,
                     java.lang.String propertyValue)
        This method set root property to fieldInfo. It set only one property. All parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        fieldInfo - to which will be property set
        propertyName - name of property which will be localized in SupportedProperties
        propertyValue - value of property which will be set to concrete property

      • transformStringToXml

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document transformStringToXml(java.lang.String stringToXml)
                                                 throws MetamodelException
        This method transform input string to Document which can be used to search via DOM, SAX or XPath,etc.
        Parameters:
        stringToXml - string which will be converted to XML
        Returns:
        converted document to XML.
        Throws:
        MetamodelException - if transformation is not possible then this exception is thrown
